generated_description: the greater springfield volunteer fire department (gsvfd) is a member of the fairfax county fire & rescue department, located in springfield, virginia. the department operates a combined system of career firefighters and paramedics, staffed 24/7, along with volunteer firefighters who provide additional staffing on engines, trucks, and medic units. gsvfd also deploys reserve engines, ambulances, brush units, utility plows, and canteen/rehab units. the department's mission includes fire prevention through education, controlling emergencies, and enhancing the level of emergency services provided to the citizens of fairfax county. the first firehouse was established in 1966 as a converted gas station.
